title: Allow sidebar extensions/plugins (with rich access/control of tab and window content)
body: Last I checked, Chrome had deprecated this.  FireFox has it, but it's a quite convoluted to create one.  This could be a great win for Edge.

comments.body:
Firefox has the most useful extension called Tree Style Tabs which lives in the sidebar showing tabs as a vertical hierarchical list (new tab is shown as a child of it's parent); it is one of few similar extensions.
https://addons.cdn.mozilla.net/user-media/previews/full/30/30844.png
Unless Microsoft wants to make sidebar tabs integral part of Edge, there needs to be a better integration of the Edge extensions on a lower level, so that one of us can produce it.
